translations.idiomatic: He sent Lu Jia to personally confer the seal and tassels.
translations.text: He sent Lu Jia to personally confer the seal and tassels.

sentences.zh: 它稽首稱臣。

translations.idiomatic: Zhao Tuo kowtowed and called himself subject.
translations.text: Zhao Tuo kowtowed and called himself subject.

sentences.zh: 六月，令士卒從入蜀、漢、關中者皆復終身。

translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, he commanded that soldiers who entered Shu, Han, Guanzhong all be exempted from service for life.
translations.text: In the sixth month, he commanded that soldiers who entered Shu, Han, Guanzhong all be exempted from service for life.

sentences.zh: 秋七月，淮南王布反。

translations.idiomatic: In the seventh month of autumn, King Huainan Ying Bu rebelled.
translations.text: In the seventh month of autumn, King Huainan Ying Bu rebelled.

sentences.zh: 上問諸將，滕公言故楚令尹薛公有籌策。

translations.idiomatic: The emperor asked the generals. Teng Gong spoke of the former Chu prime minister Xue Gong who had strategy.
translations.text: The emperor asked the generals. Teng Gong spoke of the former Chu prime minister Xue Gong who had strategy.

sentences.zh: 上見公，薛公言布形勢，上善之，封薛公 千戶。

translations.idiomatic: The emperor saw Xue Gong. Xue Gong spoke of Ying Bu's situation. The emperor approved it and enfeoffed Xue Gong with a thousand households.
translations.text: The emperor saw Xue Gong. Xue Gong spoke of Ying Bu's situation. The emperor approved it and enfeoffed Xue Gong with a thousand households.

sentences.zh: 詔王、相國擇可立為淮南王者，群臣請立子長為王。

translations.idiomatic: He commanded the kings and prime ministers to select who could be established as King of Huainan. The ministers requested establishing son Chang as king.
translations.text: He commanded the kings and prime ministers to select who could be established as King of Huainan. The ministers requested establishing son Chang as king.

sentences.zh: 上乃發上郡、北地、隴西車騎，巴蜀材官及中尉卒三萬人為皇太子衛，軍霸上。

translations.idiomatic: The emperor then dispatched Shang commandery, Beidi, Longxi chariots and cavalry, Bashu foresters and imperial guards 30,000 men as imperial crown prince guard, encamping at Bashang.
translations.text: The emperor then dispatched Shang commandery, Beidi, Longxi chariots and cavalry, Bashu foresters and imperial guards 30,000 men as imperial crown prince guard, encamping at Bashang.

sentences.zh: 布果如薛公言，東擊殺荊 王劉賈，劫其兵，度淮擊楚，楚王交走入薛。

translations.idiomatic: Ying Bu indeed as Xue Gong said, attacked east and killed King Jing Liu Jia, seized his troops, crossed the Huai to attack Chu. King Chu Jiao fled into Xue.
translations.text: Ying Bu indeed as Xue Gong said, attacked east and killed King Jing Liu Jia, seized his troops, crossed the Huai to attack Chu. King Chu Jiao fled into Xue.

translations.idiomatic: The emperor pardoned all death sentences and below, all commanded to follow the army.
translations.text: The emperor pardoned all death sentences and below, all commanded to follow the army.

sentences.zh: 徵諸侯兵，上自將以擊布。

translations.idiomatic: He summoned the feudal lords' troops. The emperor personally led them to attack Ying Bu.
translations.text: He summoned the feudal lords' troops. The emperor personally led them to attack Ying Bu.

sentences.zh: 十二年冬十月，上破布軍于會缶，布走，令別將追之。

translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month of winter in the twelfth year, the emperor broke Ying Bu's army at Huifu. Ying Bu fled. He commanded separate generals to pursue him.
translations.text: In the tenth month of winter in the twelfth year, the emperor broke Ying Bu's army at Huifu. Ying Bu fled. He commanded separate generals to pursue him.

translations.idiomatic: The emperor returned, passing through Pei. He stayed and held a banquet in Pei palace, summoning all old friends, elders, sons, and brothers to attend the banquet.
translations.text: The emperor returned, passing through Pei. He stayed and held a banquet in Pei palace, summoning all old friends, elders, sons, and brothers to attend the banquet.

sentences.zh: 發沛中兒得百二十人，教之歌。

translations.idiomatic: He selected 120 boys from Pei and taught them to sing.
translations.text: He selected 120 boys from Pei and taught them to sing.

sentences.zh: 酒酣，上擊筑，自 歌曰：「大風起兮雲飛揚，威加海內兮歸故鄉，安得猛士兮守四方！」

translations.idiomatic: When the wine was abundant, the emperor struck the zhu and sang himself: "Great wind rises, clouds fly, Might covers within the seas, return to my old home. How obtain fierce warriors to guard the four directions!"
translations.text: When the wine was abundant, the emperor struck the zhu and sang himself: "Great wind rises, clouds fly, Might covers within the seas, return to my old home. How obtain fierce warriors to guard the four directions!"

sentences.zh: 令兒皆和習之。

translations.idiomatic: He commanded all the boys to sing in harmony and practice it.
translations.text: He commanded all the boys to sing in harmony and practice it.

translations.idiomatic: The emperor then began to dance, sighing deeply and grieving in his heart, tears flowing down in streams.
translations.text: The emperor then began to dance, sighing deeply and grieving in his heart, tears flowing down in streams.

translations.idiomatic: He said to the Pei fathers and brothers: "A traveler grieves for his old home.
translations.text: He said to the Pei fathers and brothers: "A traveler grieves for his old home.

translations.idiomatic: Though I establish my capital in Guanzhong, after ten thousand years my soul will still long to enjoy Pei.
translations.text: Though I establish my capital in Guanzhong, after ten thousand years my soul will still long to enjoy Pei.

sentences.zh: 且朕自沛公以誅暴逆，遂有天下，其以沛為朕湯沐邑，復其民，世世無有所與。」

translations.idiomatic: Moreover, I from Lord of Pei executed the violent and rebellious, thus obtained the world. Make Pei my bathing county, exempt its people, generation after generation without any levies."
translations.text: Moreover, I from Lord of Pei executed the violent and rebellious, thus obtained the world. Make Pei my bathing county, exempt its people, generation after generation without any levies."

translations.idiomatic: The Pei elders and mothers, old friends daily enjoyed drinking to the utmost happiness, spoke of old matters and made merry.
translations.text: The Pei elders and mothers, old friends daily enjoyed drinking to the utmost happiness, spoke of old matters and made merry.

sentences.zh: 十餘日， 上欲去，沛父兄固請。

translations.idiomatic: After more than ten days, the emperor wanted to leave. The Pei fathers and brothers firmly requested him to stay.
translations.text: After more than ten days, the emperor wanted to leave. The Pei fathers and brothers firmly requested him to stay.

sentences.zh: 上曰：「吾人眾多，父兄不能給。」

translations.idiomatic: The emperor said: "My retinue is numerous. Fathers and brothers cannot supply it."
translations.text: The emperor said: "My retinue is numerous. Fathers and brothers cannot supply it."

sentences.zh: 乃去。

translations.idiomatic: So he left.
translations.text: So he left.

sentences.zh: 沛中空縣皆之邑西獻。

translations.idiomatic: All the empty counties in Pei went to the western outskirts to present tribute.
translations.text: All the empty counties in Pei went to the western outskirts to present tribute.

sentences.zh: 上留止，張飲三日。

translations.idiomatic: The emperor stayed and stopped, feasting for three days.
translations.text: The emperor stayed and stopped, feasting for three days.

translations.idiomatic: The Pei fathers and brothers all bowed their heads and said: "Pei luckily obtained exemption. Feng has not obtained it. We beg Your Majesty to pity us."
translations.text: The Pei fathers and brothers all bowed their heads and said: "Pei luckily obtained exemption. Feng has not obtained it. We beg Your Majesty to pity us."

translations.text: The emperor said: "Feng is where I grew up. I cannot forget it extremely.

translations.text: Han separate generals attacked Ying Bu's army north and south of Tao River. All greatly defeated them and pursued, beheading Ying Bu at Fanyang.

translations.text: Zhou Bo pacified Dai and beheaded Chen Xi at Dangcheng.

translations.text: I wish to re-establish the King of Wu. Discuss who is suitable."

translations.idiomatic: King Changsha and others said: "Marquis of Pei Liu Bi is substantial and sincere. Please establish him as King of Wu."
translations.text: King Changsha and others said: "Marquis of Pei Liu Bi is substantial and sincere. Please establish him as King of Wu."

translations.text: Already enfeoffed, the emperor summoned and said to Liu Bi: "Your appearance has the look of rebellion."

translations.idiomatic: So he patted his back and said: "Fifty years after Han, there will be disorder in the southeast. Will it be you?
translations.text: So he patted his back and said: "Fifty years after Han, there will be disorder in the southeast. Will it be you?

translations.idiomatic: However, the world of the same surname is one family. You be careful not to rebel."
translations.text: However, the world of the same surname is one family. You be careful not to rebel."

sentences.zh: 濞頓首曰：「不敢。」

translations.idiomatic: Liu Bi bowed his head and said: "I dare not."
translations.text: Liu Bi bowed his head and said: "I dare not."

sentences.zh: 十一月，行自淮南還。

translations.idiomatic: In the eleventh month, he traveled from Huainan back.
translations.text: In the eleventh month, he traveled from Huainan back.

sentences.zh: 過魯，以大牢祠孔子。

translations.idiomatic: Passing through Lu, he sacrificed to Confucius with a greater sheep offering.
translations.text: Passing through Lu, he sacrificed to Confucius with a greater sheep offering.

sentences.zh: 十二月，詔曰：「秦皇帝、楚隱王、魏安釐王、齊愍王、趙悼襄王皆絕亡後。

translations.idiomatic: In the twelfth month, the edict said: "The Qin First Emperor, Chu Yin King, Wei Anli King, Qi Min King, Zhao Dao Xiang King all have extinct lineages.
translations.text: In the twelfth month, the edict said: "The Qin First Emperor, Chu Yin King, Wei Anli King, Qi Min King, Zhao Dao Xiang King all have extinct lineages.

sentences.zh: 其與秦始皇帝守冢二十家，楚、魏、齊各十家，趙及魏公子亡忌各五家，令視其冢，復亡與它事。」

translations.idiomatic: Give to the Qin First Emperor's tomb twenty households, Chu, Wei, Qi each ten households, Zhao and Wei prince Wu Ji each five households, to oversee their tombs, exempt from other service."
translations.text: Give to the Qin First Emperor's tomb twenty households, Chu, Wei, Qi each ten households, Zhao and Wei prince Wu Ji each five households, to oversee their tombs, exempt from other service."

sentences.zh: 陳豨降將言豨反時燕王盧綰使人之豨所陰謀。

translations.idiomatic: Chen Xi's surrendering generals said that when Xi rebelled, King Yan Lu Wan sent people to Xi's place with secret plots.
translations.text: Chen Xi's surrendering generals said that when Xi rebelled, King Yan Lu Wan sent people to Xi's place with secret plots.

sentences.zh: 上使辟陽侯審食其迎綰，綰稱疾。

translations.idiomatic: The emperor sent Marquis Piyang Shen Shiqi to welcome Lu Wan. Lu Wan claimed illness.
translations.text: The emperor sent Marquis Piyang Shen Shiqi to welcome Lu Wan. Lu Wan claimed illness.

sentences.zh: 食其言綰反有端。

translations.idiomatic: Shiqi said Lu Wan had signs of rebellion.
translations.text: Shiqi said Lu Wan had signs of rebellion.

sentences.zh: 春二 月，使樊噲、周勃將兵擊綰。

translations.idiomatic: In the second month of spring, he sent Fan Kuai and Zhou Bo to lead troops to attack Lu Wan.
translations.text: In the second month of spring, he sent Fan Kuai and Zhou Bo to lead troops to attack Lu Wan.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「燕王綰與吾有故，愛之如子，聞與陳豨有謀，吾以為亡有，故使人迎綰。

translations.idiomatic: The edict said: "King Yan Lu Wan has old relations with me. I love him like a son. Hearing he had plots with Chen Xi, I thought there was nothing to it, so I sent people to welcome Lu Wan.
translations.text: The edict said: "King Yan Lu Wan has old relations with me. I love him like a son. Hearing he had plots with Chen Xi, I thought there was nothing to it, so I sent people to welcome Lu Wan.

sentences.zh: 綰稱疾不來，謀反明矣。

translations.idiomatic: Lu Wan claimed illness and did not come. His rebellion is clear.
translations.text: Lu Wan claimed illness and did not come. His rebellion is clear.

sentences.zh: 燕吏民非有罪也，賜其吏六 百石以上爵各一級。

translations.idiomatic: Yan officials and people have no crime. Grant officials of 600 piculs and above each one rank.
translations.text: Yan officials and people have no crime. Grant officials of 600 piculs and above each one rank.

sentences.zh: 與綰居，去來歸者，赦之，加爵亦一級。」

translations.idiomatic: Those who lived with Lu Wan and come and go returning, pardon them, add one rank also."
translations.text: Those who lived with Lu Wan and come and go returning, pardon them, add one rank also."

sentences.zh: 詔諸侯王議可立為燕王者，長沙王臣等請立子建為燕王。

translations.idiomatic: He commanded the feudal lords to discuss who could be established as King of Yan. King Changsha and others requested establishing son Jian as King of Yan.
translations.text: He commanded the feudal lords to discuss who could be established as King of Yan. King Changsha and others requested establishing son Jian as King of Yan.

sentences.zh: 詔曰：「南武侯織亦粵之世也，立以為南海王。」

translations.idiomatic: The edict said: "Marquis Nanwu Zhao Zhi is also of Yue lineage. Establish him as King of Nanhai."
translations.text: The edict said: "Marquis Nanwu Zhao Zhi is also of Yue lineage. Establish him as King of Nanhai."

sentences.zh: 三月，詔曰：「吾立為天子，帝有天下，十二年于今矣。

translations.idiomatic: In the third month, the edict said: "I have established myself as Son of Heaven and emperor of the world. It has been twelve years to now.
translations.text: In the third month, the edict said: "I have established myself as Son of Heaven and emperor of the world. It has been twelve years to now.

sentences.zh: 與天下之豪士賢大夫共定天下，同安輯之。

translations.idiomatic: Together with the world's heroic scholars and worthy grand masters I pacified the world and jointly settled it.
translations.text: Together with the world's heroic scholars and worthy grand masters I pacified the world and jointly settled it.

sentences.zh: 其有 功者上致之王，次為列侯，下乃食邑。

translations.idiomatic: Those who have merit, the highest become kings, next become marquises, lowest receive fiefs.
translations.text: Those who have merit, the highest become kings, next become marquises, lowest receive fiefs.

sentences.zh: 而重臣之親，或為列侯，皆令自置吏，得賦斂，女子公主。

translations.idiomatic: While the close relatives of heavy ministers, some become marquises, all are commanded to appoint their own officials, able to collect taxes, marry princesses.
translations.text: While the close relatives of heavy ministers, some become marquises, all are commanded to appoint their own officials, able to collect taxes, marry princesses.

sentences.zh: 為列侯食邑者，皆佩之印，賜大第室。

translations.idiomatic: Those who are marquises with fiefs, all wear the seal, granted great mansions.
translations.text: Those who are marquises with fiefs, all wear the seal, granted great mansions.

sentences.zh: 吏二千石，徙之長安，受小 第室。

translations.idiomatic: Officials of two thousand piculs, move them to Chang'an, receive small mansions.
translations.text: Officials of two thousand piculs, move them to Chang'an, receive small mansions.

sentences.zh: 入蜀漢定三秦者，皆世世復。

translations.idiomatic: Those who entered Shu and Han and pacified the three Qins, all have hereditary exemptions.
translations.text: Those who entered Shu and Han and pacified the three Qins, all have hereditary exemptions.

sentences.zh: 吾於天下賢士功臣，可謂亡負矣。

translations.idiomatic: I can say I have not failed the world's worthy scholars and meritorious ministers.
translations.text: I can say I have not failed the world's worthy scholars and meritorious ministers.

sentences.zh: 其有不義背天子擅起兵者，與天下共伐誅之。

translations.idiomatic: Those who are unrighteous and turn their backs on the Son of Heaven by presumptuously raising troops, the world together shall attack and execute them.
translations.text: Those who are unrighteous and turn their backs on the Son of Heaven by presumptuously raising troops, the world together shall attack and execute them.

sentences.zh: 布告天下，使明知朕意。」

translations.idiomatic: Proclaim to the world, so they clearly know my intention."
translations.text: Proclaim to the world, so they clearly know my intention."

sentences.zh: 上擊布時，為流矢所中，行道疾。

translations.idiomatic: When the emperor attacked Ying Bu, he was struck by a stray arrow, and traveling the road he became ill.
translations.text: When the emperor attacked Ying Bu, he was struck by a stray arrow, and traveling the road he became ill.

sentences.zh: 疾甚，呂后迎良醫。

translations.idiomatic: The illness was severe. Empress Lü welcomed good physicians.
translations.text: The illness was severe. Empress Lü welcomed good physicians.

sentences.zh: 醫入見，上問醫。

translations.idiomatic: The physician entered to see him. The emperor questioned the physician.
translations.text: The physician entered to see him. The emperor questioned the physician.

sentences.zh: 曰：「疾可治不醫曰可治。」

translations.idiomatic: Said: "If the illness can be cured say it can be cured. If not, say it cannot be cured."
translations.text: Said: "If the illness can be cured say it can be cured. If not, say it cannot be cured."

sentences.zh: 於 是上嫚罵之，曰：「吾以布衣提三尺取天下，此非天命乎？

translations.idiomatic: So the emperor insulted him, saying: "I from commoner status, wielding a three-foot sword took the world. Is this not Heaven's mandate?
translations.text: So the emperor insulted him, saying: "I from commoner status, wielding a three-foot sword took the world. Is this not Heaven's mandate?

sentences.zh: 命乃在天，雖扁鵲何益！」

translations.idiomatic: The mandate is in Heaven. Though Bian Que came, what benefit!"
translations.text: The mandate is in Heaven. Though Bian Que came, what benefit!"

sentences.zh: 遂不使治疾，賜黃金五十斤，罷之。

translations.idiomatic: So he did not have him treat the illness, granted fifty jin of gold, and dismissed him.
translations.text: So he did not have him treat the illness, granted fifty jin of gold, and dismissed him.

sentences.zh: 呂后問曰：「陛下百歲後，蕭相國既死， 誰令代之？」

translations.idiomatic: Empress Lü asked: "After Your Majesty reaches a hundred years, when Chancellor Xiao dies, who should replace him?"
translations.text: Empress Lü asked: "After Your Majesty reaches a hundred years, when Chancellor Xiao dies, who should replace him?"

sentences.zh: 上曰：「曹參可。」

translations.idiomatic: The emperor said: "Cao Shen is suitable."
translations.text: The emperor said: "Cao Shen is suitable."

sentences.zh: 問其次，曰：「

translations.idiomatic: Asked about the next, said: "Wang Ling is suitable, but a bit stubborn. Chen Ping can assist him.
translations.text: Asked about the next, said: "Wang Ling is suitable, but a bit stubborn. Chen Ping can assist him.

sentences.zh: 王陵可，然少戇，陳平可以助之。

translations.idiomatic: Chen Ping has excess wisdom, but is difficult to employ alone.
translations.text: Chen Ping has excess wisdom, but is difficult to employ alone.

sentences.zh: 陳平知有餘，然難獨任。

translations.idiomatic: Zhou Bo is solid and sincere but lacks refinement. However, the one who will secure the Liu clan must be Bo. Can make him grand marshal."
translations.text: Zhou Bo is solid and sincere but lacks refinement. However, the one who will secure the Liu clan must be Bo. Can make him grand marshal."

sentences.zh: 周勃重厚少文，然安劉氏者必勃也，可令為太尉。」

translations.idiomatic: Zhou Bo is solid and sincere but lacks refinement. However, the one who will secure the Liu clan must be Bo. Can make him grand marshal."
translations.text: Zhou Bo is solid and sincere but lacks refinement. However, the one who will secure the Liu clan must be Bo. Can make him grand marshal."

sentences.zh: 呂后復問其次，上曰：「此後亦非乃所知也。」

translations.idiomatic: Empress Lü asked about the next. The emperor said: "This after is also not what you know."
translations.text: Empress Lü asked about the next. The emperor said: "This after is also not what you know."

sentences.zh: 盧綰與數千人居塞下候伺，幸上疾愈，自入謝。

translations.idiomatic: Lu Wan with several thousand men dwelt below the frontier watching and waiting, hoping the emperor's illness would improve, personally entering to apologize.
translations.text: Lu Wan with several thousand men dwelt below the frontier watching and waiting, hoping the emperor's illness would improve, personally entering to apologize.

sentences.zh: 夏四月甲辰，帝崩于長樂宮。

translations.idiomatic: In the fourth month of summer on the day jiachen, the emperor passed away in Changlegong Palace.
translations.text: In the fourth month of summer on the day jiachen, the emperor passed away in Changlegong Palace.

sentences.zh: 盧綰聞之，遂亡入匈奴。

translations.idiomatic: Lu Wan heard of it and fled into the Xiongnu.
translations.text: Lu Wan heard of it and fled into the Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 呂后與審食其謀曰：「諸將故與帝為編戶民，北面為臣，心常鞅鞅，今乃事少主，非盡族是，天下不 安。」

translations.idiomatic: Empress Lü plotted with Shen Shiqi: "The generals formerly were commoners with the emperor, facing north as subjects, their hearts often dissatisfied. Now they serve a young ruler. If not exterminate their clans, the world will not be peaceful."
translations.text: Empress Lü plotted with Shen Shiqi: "The generals formerly were commoners with the emperor, facing north as subjects, their hearts often dissatisfied. Now they serve a young ruler. If not exterminate their clans, the world will not be peaceful."

sentences.zh: 以故不發喪。

translations.idiomatic: Therefore they did not announce the death.
translations.text: Therefore they did not announce the death.

sentences.zh: 人或聞，以語酈商。

translations.idiomatic: Someone heard and told Ji Shang.
translations.text: Someone heard and told Ji Shang.

sentences.zh: 酈商見審食其曰：「聞帝已崩，四日不發喪，欲誅諸將。

translations.idiomatic: Ji Shang saw Shen Shiqi and said: "Heard the emperor has passed away. Four days without announcing death, wanting to execute the generals.
translations.text: Ji Shang saw Shen Shiqi and said: "Heard the emperor has passed away. Four days without announcing death, wanting to execute the generals.

sentences.zh: 誠如此，天下危矣。

translations.idiomatic: If truly so, the world is in danger.
translations.text: If truly so, the world is in danger.

sentences.zh: 陳平、灌嬰將十萬守滎陽，樊噲、周勃將二十 萬定燕代，此聞帝崩，諸將皆誅，必連兵還鄉，以攻關中。

translations.idiomatic: Chen Ping and Guan Ying lead 100,000 guarding Xingyang, Fan Kuai and Zhou Bo lead 200,000 pacifying Yan and Dai. If they hear the emperor has died and the generals are all executed, they will surely join forces and return home to attack Guanzhong.
translations.text: Chen Ping and Guan Ying lead 100,000 guarding Xingyang, Fan Kuai and Zhou Bo lead 200,000 pacifying Yan and Dai. If they hear the emperor has died and the generals are all executed, they will surely join forces and return home to attack Guanzhong.

sentences.zh: 大臣內畔，諸將外反，亡可蹻足待也。」

translations.idiomatic: Ministers rebel internally, generals revolt externally. There will be no time to even stamp one's foot."
translations.text: Ministers rebel internally, generals revolt externally. There will be no time to even stamp one's foot."

sentences.zh: 審食其入言之，乃以丁未發喪，大赦天下。

translations.idiomatic: Shen Shiqi entered and spoke of it. So on the day dingwei they announced the death and granted a great amnesty to the world.
translations.text: Shen Shiqi entered and spoke of it. So on the day dingwei they announced the death and granted a great amnesty to the world.

sentences.zh: 五月丙寅，葬長陵。

translations.idiomatic: In the fifth month on the day bingyin, buried at Changling.
translations.text: In the fifth month on the day bingyin, buried at Changling.

sentences.zh: 已下，皇太子群臣皆反至太上皇廟。

translations.idiomatic: After descending, the imperial crown prince and ministers all returned to the Taishang Huang temple.
translations.text: After descending, the imperial crown prince and ministers all returned to the Taishang Huang temple.

sentences.zh: 群臣曰：「帝起細微，撥亂世反之正，平定天下，為漢太祖，功最高。」

translations.idiomatic: The ministers said: "The emperor rose from humble origins, corrected the chaotic world to righteousness, pacified the world, became Han Taizu. His merit is highest."
translations.text: The ministers said: "The emperor rose from humble origins, corrected the chaotic world to righteousness, pacified the world, became Han Taizu. His merit is highest."

sentences.zh: 上尊號曰高皇帝。

translations.idiomatic: They honored him with the title Gao Huangdi.
translations.text: They honored him with the title Gao Huangdi.

sentences.zh: 初，高祖不脩文學，而性明達，好謀，能聽，自監門戍卒，見之如舊。

translations.idiomatic: Initially, Gaozu did not study literature, but his nature was clear and understanding, fond of planning, able to listen. From gate guard to soldier, he treated people as old friends.
translations.text: Initially, Gaozu did not study literature, but his nature was clear and understanding, fond of planning, able to listen. From gate guard to soldier, he treated people as old friends.

sentences.zh: 初順民心作三章之約。

translations.idiomatic: Initially he followed the people's hearts and made the three chapter covenant.
translations.text: Initially he followed the people's hearts and made the three chapter covenant.

sentences.zh: 天下既定，命蕭何次律令，韓信申軍法，張蒼定章程，叔孫通制禮儀，陸賈造新語。

translations.idiomatic: After the world was settled, he commanded Xiao He to arrange the statutes and commands, Han Xin to explain military law, Zhang Cang to establish procedures, Shu Sun Tong to create rituals and ceremonies, Lu Jia to compose new discourses.
translations.text: After the world was settled, he commanded Xiao He to arrange the statutes and commands, Han Xin to explain military law, Zhang Cang to establish procedures, Shu Sun Tong to create rituals and ceremonies, Lu Jia to compose new discourses.

sentences.zh: 又與功臣剖符作誓，丹書鐵契，金匱石室，藏之宗廟。

translations.idiomatic: He also with the meritorious ministers divided tallies and made oaths, red writing on iron contracts, gold caskets and stone chambers, stored in the ancestral temple.
translations.text: He also with the meritorious ministers divided tallies and made oaths, red writing on iron contracts, gold caskets and stone chambers, stored in the ancestral temple.

sentences.zh: 雖日不暇給，規摹弘遠矣。

translations.idiomatic: Though days were not sufficient, his plans were broad and far-reaching.
translations.text: Though days were not sufficient, his plans were broad and far-reaching.
